thread.title: Convert Video to Apple iPod Video MP4 Format
thread.title_full: Convert Video to Apple iPod Video MP4 Format

title: Convert Video to Apple iPod Video MP4 Format
text: Convert Video to Apple iPod Video MP4 Format , 24 September 2015 -- Do you have an Apple iPod and want to use it to watch your favorite home video? But you do not know how to convert files to iPod compatible format? AllPepole Video Converter is what you now need to solve this problem. This simple yet powerful video conversion tool for your home video library a few mouse clicks transfer to iPod (MP4 / H.264) format. After the download is complete, run AllPepole VideoConverter.exe file and follow the installation wizard instructions. To select a video you want to convert the input file name hit the Browse ... button next to the field. When you select the video input file, open the Devices tab of the main toolbar, then press the Apple key. In the configuration file (field) provided in the list of selected profiles iPod. You can also click the Advanced button to manually set the iPod profile parameters, open the Conversion tab portion of the output file. The AllPepole mobile upload application will be launched to guide you through the upload process so that you can without difficulty convert your video files to your Apple iPod. When you click the Upload button the upload process itself will take place. It will take some time depending on the output video file size. Now you can enjoy your favorite home video DVD and video files on your iPod! Allpepole VideoConverter at Mac APP store:
